subject: Order #SSN2169 issue
description_text: The shipment is stopped at origin for being prohibited

conversations.body_text: Hi Mohamed ElSedfy,    Shipments to Saudi Arabia carry a certain risk of being returned, as hydraulic rods are prohibited items. However, there is no need to worry, as we will immediately arrange for a reshipment.

Hi,
Any updates on this?

On Sat, 2 Aug 2025 at 6:13 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Mohamed ElSedfy,    This is your new shipping number:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01140075892

You declared it for 50$ or less like the first time, right?

On Tue, 5 Aug 2025 at 10:09 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Mohamed ElSedfy，    Yes, the declared amount is $47.9.
